wikipedia_page.main: James Simpson (8 December 1923 – 1 May 2010) was an English professional footballer who played as an inside forward in the Football League for Chesterfield and in non-League football for Buxton, and as a wartime guest for Stoke City.

response: * Jim Simpson (Australian politician) (1905–1968), member of the New South Wales Legislative Assembly
